problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, points A, B, and C are on ⊙O, ∠ABO = N_0, ∠ACO = N_1, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
raw_answer: 解:过A作⊙O的直径,交⊙O于D；在△OAB中,OA=OB,即∠OBA=∠OAB,则∠BOD=∠ABO+∠OAB=2×40°=80°,同理可得:∠COD=∠ACO+∠OAC=2×30°=60°,故∠BOC=∠BOD+∠COD=140°,故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查了圆周角定理,涉及了等腰三角形的性质及三角形的外角性质,解答本题的关键是求出∠COD及∠BOD的度数．
